Name: .AspNetCore.Correlation.[hash]
Purpose: Authentication security cookie used to correlate sign-in requests

Name: .AspNetCore.OpenIdConnect.Nonce.[hash]
Purpose: Security cookie for OpenID Connect authentication to prevent replay attacks

Name: __cf_bm
Purpose: Cloudflare bot management cookie to distinguish between humans and bots

Name: __cf_bm
Purpose: Cloudflare bot management cookie to distinguish between humans and bots

Name: __cf_bm
Purpose: Cloudflare bot management cookie to distinguish between humans and bots

Name: __RequestVerificationToken
Purpose: Anti-forgery token to prevent cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks

Name: __Secure-ROLLOUT_TOKEN
Purpose: YouTube cookie for managing feature rollout and A/B testing

Name: __tmbid
Purpose: Used to store a unique visitor identifier for analytics purposes

Name: _a_id
Purpose: Analytics identifier cookie used to track visitor behavior on the site

Name: _cfuvid
Purpose: Cloudflare unique visitor ID used for request routing and connection optimization

Name: _dd_s
Purpose: Datadog session tracking cookie for monitoring and analytics

Name: _fbp
Purpose: Facebook Pixel cookie used for advertising tracking and measurement

Name: _ga
Purpose: Google Analytics cookie used to distinguish unique users

Name: _ga_ENJQ0W7S1M
Purpose: Persists session state in Google Analytics 4.

Name: _gcl_au
Purpose: This is a Conversion linker set by Tag Manager that allows us to track actions taken on the Website through Google Analytics.

Name: _GRECAPTCHA
Purpose: Google reCAPTCHA cookie used to distinguish between humans and bots

Name: ANONCHK
Purpose: Microsoft cookie used for checking if anonymous users can be tracked

Name: AWSALB
Purpose: Used by the website for load balancing servers

Name: AWSALBCORS
Purpose: AWS Application Load Balancer cookie with CORS support for sticky sessions

Name: AWSALBCORS
Purpose: Used by the kuula virtual tour software for load balancing servers

Name: AWSALBCORS
Purpose: Used by the website for load balancing servers

Name: AWSELBCORS
Purpose: Used by the Blackbaud fundraising software for load balancing servers

Name: bcookie
Purpose: LinkedIn browser identification cookie for authentication and analytics

Name: bid
Purpose: Consent management platform cookie used to store user ID

Name: buid
Purpose: Microsoft browser unique identifier for authentication services

Name: cid_[hash]
Purpose: Customer ID cookie for advertising and analytics purposes

Name: CookieControl
Purpose: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.

Name: esctx
Purpose: Microsoft authentication context security token for session management

Name: esctx-1ChgKyjhY44
Purpose: Microsoft authentication context security token for specific authentication flow

Name: EXPIRE_TIMESTAMP
Purpose: Recruitment platform cookie to track session expiration time

Name: FormsWebSessionId
Purpose: Required for functionality of Microsoft forms embedded on the website

Name: FPAU
Purpose: Campaign Manager, Display & Video 360, Google Ads, Search Ads 360

Name: fpc
Purpose: Required to display Sharepoint videos and images embedded on the Website.

Name: FPID
Purpose: Set by the University of Stirling's Google Analytics account.

Name: FPLC
Purpose: Set by the University of Stirling's Google Analytics account.

Name: li_gc
Purpose: LinkedIn guest control cookie for consent preferences

Name: lidc
Purpose: LinkedIn cookie for routing and session identification

Name: MR
Purpose: Microsoft/Bing marketing and referral tracking cookie

Name: MR
Purpose: Microsoft Office marketing and referral tracking cookie

Name: MUID
Purpose: Microsoft user identifier cookie for tracking and personalization

Name: MUID
Purpose: Microsoft User Identifier tracking cookie used by Bing and placed by embedded Microsoft Forms.

Name: OH.DCAffinity
Purpose: Microsoft 365 data center affinity cookie for load balancing

Name: OH.FLID
Purpose: Microsoft 365 feature level ID for service customization

Name: SM
Purpose: Required for functionality of Microsoft documents embedded on the website

Name: SRM_B
Purpose: Bing search marketing cookie for personalization and analytics

Name: stsservicecookie
Purpose: Microsoft security token service cookie for authentication

Name: VISITOR_INFO1_LIVE
Purpose: YouTube cookie used for bandwidth estimation and video quality settings

Name: VISITOR_PRIVACY_METADATA
Purpose: Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain.

Name: vuid
Purpose: Set by Vimeo as part of embedded Vimeo services on our website. They enable Vimeo to play the video and collect analytics data such as how long a viewer has watched the video.

Name: x-ms-gateway-slice
Purpose: Required to display Sharepoint videos and images embedded on the Website.

Name: YSC
Purpose: To keep statistics of which videos from YouTube the user has seen by registering a unique ID. It is set by YouTube.

Name: WEBSERVERID
Purpose: Session cookie to identify the current web server in use (t4web1 / t4web2) for load balancing.

Name: JSESSIONID
Purpose: Session cookie to assist when loading content in the University Portal, including web forms.

Name: paok-shib
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: paokv0
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: paok
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: psess-shib
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: psessv0
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: psess
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: athValid
Purpose: Records user login status for access to staff and student restricted web pages.

Name: _____SITEGUID
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: ASP.NET_SessionId
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: DSFPartnerID
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: COMPBRANDjcksjsbopwvonovxpbiq4doi
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: LASTSITEACTIVITY
Purpose: Used to store information about user preferences and actions for the staff/student print shop.

Name: favs
Purpose: Used to store user selected list of favourite courses

Name: _gid
Purpose: Distinguishes users and counts how many people visit our site by tracking if you've visited before.

Name: _dc_gtm_UA-340900-19
Purpose: Used to throttle request rate.

Name: _hjClosedSurveyInvites
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set once a user interacts with an External Link Survey invitation modal. It is used to ensure that the same invite does not reappear if it has already been shown.

Name: _hjDonePolls
Purpose: Hotjar cookie is set once a user completes a survey using the On-site Survey widget. It is used to ensure that the same survey does not reappear if it has already been filled in.

Name: _hjUserAttributesHash
Purpose: User Attributes sent through the Hotjar Identify API are cached for the duration of the session in order to know when an attribute has changed and needs to be updated.

Name: _hjCachedUserAttributes
Purpose: This cookie stores User Attributes which are sent through the Hotjar Identify API, whenever the user is not in the sample. Collected attributes will only be saved to Hotjar servers if the user interacts with a Hotjar Feedback tool.

Name: _hjLocalStorageTest
Purpose: This cookie is used to check if the Hotjar Tracking Script can use local storage. If it can, a value of 1 is set in this cookie. The data stored has no expiration time, but is deleted almost immediately after it is created.

Name: _hjIncludedInPageviewSample
Purpose: This cookie is set to let Hotjar know whether that user is included in the data sampling defined by your site's pageview limit.

Name: _hjIncludedInSessionSample
Purpose: This cookie is set to let Hotjar know whether that user is included in the data sampling defined by your site's daily session limit.

Name: _hjAbsoluteSessionInProgress
Purpose: This cookie is used to detect the first pageview session of a user. This is a True/False flag set by the cookie.

Name: _hjFirstSeen
Purpose: This is set to identify a new user's first session. It stores a true/false value, indicating whether this was the first time Hotjar saw this user. It is used by Recording filters to identify new user sessions.

Name: _hjViewportId
Purpose: This stores information about the user viewport such as size and dimensions.

Name: _hjRecordingEnabled
Purpose: This is added when a Recording starts and is read when the recording module is initialized to see if the user is already in a recording in a particular session.

Name: nmstat
Purpose: Set by our website quality assurance tool Siteimprove to give us an overview of visitor behaviour and measure site performance. This cookie contains a randomly generated ID used to recognize the browser when a visitor reads a page.

Name: AWSELBCORS
Purpose: This enables Siteimprove Analytics to determine the sequence of a user's page views.

Name: utm_campaign
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: utm_medium
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: utm_source
Purpose: Captures campaign information provided as visible parameters in the page URL. These parameters are provided as part of the link that you clicked to get to our Website.

Name: fr
Purpose: Contains a User ID, Browser ID and timestamp plus other miscellaneous data. Used to deliver, measure and improve the relevancy of ads. It is set by Facebook.

Name: personalization_id
Purpose: This cookie is set by X to measure the performance of advertising campaigns through X across different browsers and devices used by a visitor.

Name: user-id
Purpose: Persists a unique user ID for remarketing. Google uses cookies to help customize advertising on Google properties, like Google Search.

Name: Hm_lpvt_27da419cc768
Purpose: Used by Baidu Analytics to limit the frequency of requests and records a unique ID used to generate statistical data on how the visitor uses the Website.

Name: tt_appInfo
Purpose: These cookies are used by TikTok to assign a unique ID to a user to track them across websites.

Name: tt_sessionId
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: _tt_enable_cookie
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: _ttp
Purpose: Used by the social networking service, TikTok, for tracking the use of embedded services.

Name: HSID
Purpose: This cookie is set by DoubleClick (which is owned by Google) to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites.

Name: SAPISID
Purpose: This DoubleClick cookie is generally set through the site by advertising partners, and used by them to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites.

Name: APISID
Purpose: This DoubleClick cookie is generally set through the site by advertising partners, and used by them to build a profile of the website visitor's interests and show relevant ads on other sites.

Name: _scid
Purpose: Used to save marketing cookie preferences.

Name: _sctr
Purpose: Used to determine whether a third party tag will be called in Snap Ads Pixel.

Name: auid
Purpose: Holds the advertising ID of the user in mobile devices. Used for tracking user actions, such as clicks on the recommendations

Name: lpv
Purpose: Distinguishes conversion from Pardot site or advert.

Name: _schn
Purpose: This pixel is used to retarget and attribute traffic coming from the social network.

Name: leadgen.api_session
Purpose: Stores client ID for Leadgen applications.

Name: UserMatchHistory
Purpose: LinkedIn Ads ID syncing

Name: li_fat_id
Purpose: Member indirect identifier for Members for conversion tracking, retargeting, analytics

Name: _guid
Purpose: Used to identify a LinkedIn Member for advertising through Google Ads

Name: BizographicsOptOut
Purpose: Determine opt-out status for Third-party tracking

Name: lms_ads
Purpose: Used to identify LinkedIn Members off LinkedIn in the Designated Countries for advertising

Name: _gcl_aw
Purpose: Used through Google Ads to understand user interaction with the site and advertising

Purpose: User Attributes sent through the Hotjar Identify API are cached for the duration of the session in order to know when an attribute has changed and needs to be updated.

Purpose: Used for tracking and personalization with Lax SameSite attribute.

Purpose: Used for tracking and personalization with Strict SameSite attribute.

Name: m-dynamicFontSize
Purpose: Stores user's font size preference for accessibility.

Name: m-login
Purpose: Used for authentication and to maintain login state.

Name: m-s
Purpose: Used for session management.

Name: m-sa
Purpose: Used for session analytics.

Name: m-tgvs
Purpose: Used for tracking and analytics.

Name: m-theme
Purpose: Stores the user's preferred theme.

Name: m-themeStrategy
Purpose: Stores the strategy for applying the user's theme.

Name: m-uid
Purpose: Unique user identifier for tracking and personalization.

Name: OptanonConsent
